page.title: 04Marsh Green 2
page.content: the land in and around Marsh Green is being bought up and built on so gradually the village is growing. The old thatched cottages are being replaced with new tiled houses. Marsh Green is now made up of several thatched cottages, a row of council houses and a lot more newer houses. It has a bus stop, a telephone box and a post box. Apart from this there is really not a lot. There are 2 bus routes through Marsh Green one to Exeter and one the other way through West Hill to Ottery St Mary and Honiton.
